Articles.Content:
Name's DarkBabylon, and I am looking forward to see what people can make here, and if there is anything I can help with, I would jump on the opportunity.

Current business:

-Video editing

-3D modelling (still newbie, and looking to improve)

Hello DarkBabylon. I can make this.

Welcome to the forum.

I feel bad not really anybody's replied to this post yet, usually there's an immediate swarm of people jumping to greet newcomers and make them feel at home, but I suppose the only reason they haven't is because you didn't put very much in the post. It's not a big deal, though, I'm sure people will be crowding in here soon!

Also, I love your username.

Welcome to the KSP forums DarkBabylon

We'd love to see what you can make too, maybe you have an unplanned Munar colony?

Have fun and fly safe!
